data.text: We are HIRING! Stardock is hiring for roles on our Art, Design, Engineering, General Management, Marketing, and Production teams at our Plymouth, Michigan studio. Please check out our careers page at https://lnkd.in/gxj5gFF to find full job descriptions for these open positions. Interested in applying? Apply directly via our careers page! We review resumes regularly and will reach out if we think there is a potential fit. #hiring #gamedev #gamedevjobs #gamedevelopment #workingames
